Reward Coins

every time you pay your credit card bills on CRED, you receive CRED coins. you can use these to win exclusive rewards or get special access to curated products and experiences. on CRED, good begets good.

Informations
about Cred

CRED is a members-only credit card bill payment app founded by Kunal Shah in 2018 and is headquartered in Bangalore, Karnataka.

CRED allows its members to make payments using the app. The app’s focus is to make use of credit card payments easier, automated, and making payments early. Payments made using the CRED app allow the members to earn CRED coins.

CRED was formed with two primary objectives- to enhance life for creditworthy individuals and to actuate credit services to people to dilate the financial behaviour in the country.

CRED is a members-only club that rewards individuals for their timely credit card bill payments by providing them with exclusive offers and access to premium experiences.

You can track your payment history for all cards added on the platform, as well as keep track of upcoming bills. Features such as 'Kill the bill' enable you to earn cashback towards repaying your bill.
